question: Which player won the menâ€™s singles title at ATP Finals-2019?
explanation: Stefanos Tsitsipas beat Dominic Thiem beat to win the ATP Finals, his fourth career title and third of 2019. The 2019 ATP Finals was a men\'s tennis tournament played at the O2 Arena in London, United Kingdom, from 10 to 17 November 2019. It was the 50th edition of the tournament. The tournament was run by the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) and was part of the 2019 ATP Tour. The event took on indoor hard courts.
